org.openremote.entities.panel

Class SwitchWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openremote.entities.panel.Widget
      • org.openremote.entities.panel.SensoryWidget
        • org.openremote.entities.panel.SwitchWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandWidget, NotifyPropertyChanged, ResourceChangedCallback, ResourceConsumer

    public class SwitchWidget
extends SensoryWidget
implements CommandWidget
    Switch widget is capable of sending an alternating on/off command and is capable of feeding back its' current state based on a sensor value.
    Author:
    Richard Turner

        public void onSensorValueChanged(int sensorId,
                        java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from class: SensoryWidget
        Called by the controller service whenever a linked sensor's value changes. The panel that owns this widget must be registered with the controller service to receive notifications.
        Specified by:
